rawText:
SANTHANAPRIYALAKSHMI 
.NET TEAM LEAD | Solution Architect 
+91-9578956695 | spriyalakshmimca@gmail.com 
Tiruppur, Tamil Nadu 
 
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY 
Experienced .NET Team Lead with 7+ years of expertise in building scalable 
enterprise applications using .NET Core, C#, Web API, and micro services 
architecture. Proven track record of leading cross-functional teams, owning 
end-to-end delivery, and driving quality software solutions in banking, logistics, 
and financial services domains. Adept in solution design, clean code practices, 
DevOps integration, and agile methodologies. 
 
CORE COMPETENCIES 
Languages & Frameworks: .NET Core, C#, ASP.NET MVC, Blazor, VB.NET, ADO.NET 
ORMs: Entity Framework Core, Dapper 
Architecture: Microservices, REST APIs, Multithreading, Async/Await, MVC 
Databases: MS SQL Server, MySQL, MongoDB 
Reporting Tools: Crystal Reports, DevExpress 
DevOps & CI/CD: Jenkins, Octopus, GitHub, Bitbucket 
Cloud & Tools: AWS, Azure, Jira, Agile/Scrum 
Soft Skills: Team Leadership, Agile Delivery, Cross-functional Collaboration, Mentorship 
 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
Senior Software Developer 
Infinite Computer Solutions – Bengaluru 
Oct 2023 – Present 
 Leading a team of developers for a financial web application. 
 Architected and developed scalable RESTful APIs using .NET Core. 

 Mentored junior developers and led code reviews, improving code quality by 
30%. 
 Integrated CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins and Octopus for seamless deployments. 
Software Developer 
Mobile Programming LLC – Bengaluru 
Aug 2022 – Oct 2023 
 Designed and developed REST APIs for high-performance fintech applications. 
 Contributed to database design and implemented optimized stored procedures. 
 Drove agile practices by participating in sprint planning and demos. 
Software Developer 
Sonata Software – Bengaluru 
Mar 2022 – Aug 2022 
 Built and maintained modules in a healthcare web platform using .NET Core. 
 Evaluated and implemented new technologies to improve performance. 
Software Developer 
Imcrinox Technologies – Bengaluru 
Jan 2020 – Mar 2022 
 Developed RESTful services for mobile and web-based applications. 
 Worked across MySQL, SQL Server, and MongoDB for various projects. 
Junior Programmer 
Ideatec Software India Pvt. Ltd. – Coimbatore 
Nov 2017 – Oct 2019 
 Developed logistics software using VB.NET, Crystal Reports. 
 Performed unit testing and improved test coverage for critical modules. 
 
 
 
 

KEY PROJECTS 
Elan Credit Card Platform 
Banking & Credit Solutions 
 Built APIs to integrate with third-party services (Monevo, TransUnion). 
 Enhanced transaction reliability and customer onboarding speed. 
Tech: .NET Core, Web API, Dapper, MSSQL 
Nita Mukesh Ambani Cultural Center 
Event Management Platform 
 Developed modules for event scheduling and user management. 
Tech: .NET Core, EF Core, Async/Await, MSSQL 
Melior Discovery 
Project Tracking and Analytics 
 Implemented project allocation, monitoring dashboards, and user roles. 
Tech: .NET Core, EF Core, Dapper, Web API, MSSQL 
BranchX Loan Platform 
Loan & Credit Processing 
 Created modules for loan management and Razorpay integration. 
Tech: .NET Core, ADO.NET, Web API, MySQL 
Creditly 
Unified Banking Platform 
 Developed APIs for various banking operations (loans, credit cards). 
Tech: .NET Core MVC, Web API, ADO.NET, MySQL 
Mehala Sales Corporation (Logistics ERP) 
 Developed invoice/report generation and WMS/TMS modules. 
Tech: VB.NET, Crystal Reports, Web Services, MS SQL 
 
 
 
 

EDUCATION 
Master of Computer Applications (MCA) 
Dr. Mahalingam College of Engineering and Technology, Pollachi 
2016 | CGPA: 8.1/10 
B.Sc in Computer Science 
Chikkanna Govt Arts and Science College, Tirupur 
2013 | CGPA: 7.1/10 
LANGUAGES 
English, Tamil
